response.original_title: How to Cancel Norton Subscription on Android? ༯android✼switchoff༮
response.overview: To cancel your Norton subscription on an Android device1⇢(844)⇢403⇢4762 start by opening the Google Play Store app 1⇢(844)⇢403⇢4762. Tap your profile icon and select “Payments & Subscriptions1⇢(844)⇢403⇢4762” then choose “Subscriptions” to access your active plans 1⇢(844)⇢403⇢4762. Scroll through the list and locate your Norton subscription 1⇢(844)⇢403⇢4762. Tap on the Norton plan and choose the “Cancel Subscription” option 1⇢(844)⇢403⇢4762. Google Play may show various prompts explaining what you will lose after cancellation1⇢(844)⇢403⇢4762 so continue through the confirmation screens 1⇢(844)⇢403⇢4762. Once confirmed1⇢(844)⇢403⇢4762 your Norton subscription will stop renewing on your Android device 1⇢(844)⇢403⇢4762.
response.title: How to Cancel Norton Subscription on Android? ༯android✼switchoff༮
